archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Record Additional Sales Lead Information
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Record more party information about a sales lead, such as offerings that are of interest.

properties.value: Record Additional Sales Lead Information records more party information about the sales lead, such as offerings that are of interest based on the interaction with the lead. If a marketing communication included product offering information this process may also confirm interest in it and/or record additional offerings for which the sales lead is interested.
